title: Faithfulness to Context
description: Does the model's answer strictly adhere to the provided documents, avoiding outside knowledge or hallucinations?

title: Reasoning Ability
description: Can the model synthesize information from multiple retrieved chunks to answer complex questions?

title: Speed and Cost
description: RAG can be token-intensive. Efficient models are crucial for maintaining a good user experience and managing costs.

title: Tool Use / Function Calling
description: Robust function calling is essential for integrating the retrieval step into the model's workflow.
